title: Fort Worth Star Telegram
content: [Fort Worth Star Telegramâ€™s logo (the slab serif part).](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001007/http:/www.dfw.com/images/logos/site/dfw/dfw/site_logo_340x60.gif) Any ideas?
author: otterhound

comments.content:
I was going to guess Custom as well.

[The Serif Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001007/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FK.108405.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Star+Telegram&sampleSize=48) or [Officina Serif Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001007/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.744.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Star+Telegram&sampleSize=48) will get you close.
Officina Serif Bold is pretty close; thanks.
